Typography

Change the size, weight, and other font properties of the text.

Font Family

Noto Sans is to be used throughout the portal- Download here

Font Sizes
Font Size Size
H1 3rem or 48px
H2 2.5rem or 40px
H3 2rem or 32px
H4 1.5rem or 24px
H5 1.25rem or 20px
H6 1rem or 16px
Paragraph 0.875rem or 14px
Label 0.75rem or 12px

This design system was designed for Winnow by Digital Technology Team.

Noticed a typo? Or something unclear? Please connect with Johnson Koh or Jynn Lyi.
